Action Nostalgia MissionsTake on the role of Sarah Connor and the T-800 terminator as you embark on a series of dangerous missions to face the relentless T-1000. Your goal is to stop Skynet before it destroys the human race. Each mission is filled with action and the nostalgic atmosphere of 90s slot machines. The nameless heroIn Terminator 2D: NO FATE Nintendo Switch also takes a look into the future as John Connor leads the human Resistance against the machines in a fight for survival.
